metadata.title: CVE-2020-18771 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Exiv2 0.27.99.0 has a global buffer over-read inExiv2::Internal::Nikon1MakerNote::print0x0088 in nikonmn_int.cpp which canresult in an information leak.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18771` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.27.2-8ubuntu2
libexiv2-27 - 0.27.2-8ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.2-8ubuntu2').
